tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RealEstateEscrowTransactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(100),
    seller_name VARCHAR(100),
    property_address VARCHAR(255),
    escrow_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    transaction_date DATE,
    encrypted_data BYTES
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    buyer_id INT,
    seller_id INT,
    escrow_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    escrow_status VARCHAR(10),
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Escrow_Accounts (
  account_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  account_holder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  property_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Escrow_Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EscrowServices (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_address VARCHAR(255),
	buyer_name VARCHAR(255),
	seller_name VARCHAR(255),
	escrow_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	escrow_id INT,
	transaction_date DATE,
	amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	payment_method VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (escrow_id) REFERENCES EscrowServices(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Messages (
	message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sender VARCHAR(255),
	receiver VARCHAR(255),
	message_text TEXT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
